content: I think I'll try the Pier to Pier Walk. It sounds like a great way to get some exercise and enjoy the views of the Bay Bridge and Alcatraz. I've always been fascinated by the sea lions at Pier 39, so I'll make sure to stop by and say hello. By the way, do you know if there are any good souvenir shops or local markets in the Fisherman's Wharf area where I can pick up some gifts for my family?
